Class FRSManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FRSManager

  • public class FRSManager
extends java.lang.Object
    FRSManager links all the other manager classes i.e. DataManager, SearchManager, BokingManager and DisplayManager. The manager classes communicates with each other via this class.
    Author:
    Sandeep Khan
